00021    /*
00022    * Constructor.
00023    */
00024    Label::Label(const char* label)
00025     : label_(label)
00026    {}

00029    * Copy constructor.
00030    */
00031    Label::Label(const Label& other)
00032     : label_(other.label_)
00033    {}

00036    * Destructor.

00039    {}
00040 
00041    /*
00042    * Return label string.
00043    */
00044    std::string Label::string() const
00045    {  return label_; }
00046 
00047    /*
00048    * Extract a label from an input stream.
00049    */
00050    std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& in, Label label)
00051    {
00052       std::string actual;
00053       in >> actual;
00054       if ( actual != label.label_ ) {
00055          Log::file() << "Error reading label"          << std::endl;
00056          Log::file() << "Expected: " <<  label.label_  << std::endl;
00057     Log::file() << "Scanned:  " <<  actual        << std::endl;
00058          UTIL_THROW("Incorrect label");
00059       };
00060       return in;
00061    }
00062 
00063    /*
00064    * Insert a Label into an output stream.
00065    */
00066    std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, Label label)
00067    {
00068       out << std::left << std::setw(Label::LabelWidth) 
00069           << label.label_; 
00070       out << std::right;
00071       return out;
00072    }
00073 
00074 }
